quote: Speaking loud or moderate does not necessary mean that the contents are always factually accurate.
author: Kamara

quote: Aside from natural phenomena which occur as a result of disobedience of natural order, all other occurences are stage scenes.
author: Kamara

quote: The 'human person' is not absolutely flawless
author: Kamara

quote: Someone else perception cannot be another person reality.
author: Kamara

quote: Success starts from the first attempt.
author: Kamara

quote: The contents of a person mind will determine whether they should be dabate or not.
author: Kamara

quote: Just because someone else has another prospective doesn't mean that they are your enemy.
author: Kamara

quote: Each trial take you away from the shadow of ignorance.
author: Kamara
